posts.post_title: Polar Bear Coupons For Sale - SOLD
posts.post_content: Posted By: Jon Canfield I recently upgraded the Polar Bear coupon in my collection so I am offering my duplicates for sale. Both coupons are in good shape with normal wear. The one on the right does have slight side chipping but neither have any tears at all. (The folds in the scan below appear to be tears but I assure you they are not...) [URL="http://s82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/?action=view¤t=polarbearcoupons.gif"][IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/polarbearcoupons.gif[/IMG][/URL] The price for the coupon on the left is $20.00 (NOW SOLD), the price for the one on the right is $15.00 (NOW SOLD). Both prices include shipping... Emails take priority over posts.
